cases.title: UI split in 3 tabs within category loader for separation of concerns
cases.description: We can see three tabs where each tab allows us to have separate table for separation of concerns for drawer & summary records.

cases.title: Frontend records from drawer to table of pseudo
cases.description: We can add manual entries for pseudo from drawer to the table of category loader.
cases.preconditions: The user have selected the tab of Pseudo from the 3 tabs above the search facility
cases.postconditions: Records are managed and displayed in the table as user adds them from drawer.
